item.title: Are AI Detectors Good Enough? A Survey on Quality of Datasets With Machine-Generated Texts
item.description: AI-generated text detection models struggle in real-world scenarios due to flawed training datasets; this paper provides a systematic review and proposes robust evaluation methods for these datasets.

item.title: BiGR: Harnessing Binary Latent Codes for Image Generation and Improved Visual Representation Capabilities
item.description: BiGR: a novel conditional image generation model using compact binary codes, unifying generative and discriminative tasks for improved visual representation and zero-shot generalization across multipl…

item.title: How Do Training Methods Influence the Utilization of Vision Models?
item.description: Training methods dramatically alter which parts of a vision model are actually used for decisions, revealing surprising variations in layer importance across different training techniques.

item.title: Montessori-Instruct: Generate Influential Training Data Tailored for Student Learning
item.description: Montessori-Instruct optimizes synthetic data generation for LLMs by aligning teacher models with student learning preferences, significantly improving student model performance.

item.title: NaturalBench: Evaluating Vision-Language Models on Natural Adversarial Samples
item.description: NaturalBench: a new benchmark reveals vision-language models struggle with simple, natural images and questions, highlighting biases and prompting development of more robust models.

item.title: Teaching Models to Balance Resisting and Accepting Persuasion
item.description: LLMs can be easily persuaded; this paper introduces Persuasion-Balanced Training (PBT) to make them both resistant to misinformation and receptive to helpful influence, leading to improved performance…

item.title: DAWN: Dynamic Frame Avatar with Non-autoregressive Diffusion Framework for Talking Head Video Generation
item.description: DAWN: a novel non-autoregressive diffusion framework for all-at-once generation of dynamic talking head videos, achieving higher quality and speed than autoregressive methods.

item.title: Diffusion Curriculum: Synthetic-to-Real Generative Curriculum Learning via Image-Guided Diffusion
item.description: Diffusion Curriculum Learning (DisCL) generates high-quality synthetic data via image-guided diffusion, significantly boosting accuracy in long-tail and low-quality data classification.

item.title: DPLM-2: A Multimodal Diffusion Protein Language Model
item.description: DPLM-2: a new multimodal model revolutionizes protein design by simultaneously generating protein sequences and 3D structures, surpassing existing methods in accuracy and diversity.

item.title: FiTv2: Scalable and Improved Flexible Vision Transformer for Diffusion Model
item.description: FiTv2, an enhanced vision transformer, enables efficient and high-quality image generation at arbitrary resolutions and aspect ratios, surpassing existing diffusion models.

item.title: Looking Inward: Language Models Can Learn About Themselves by Introspection
item.description: Language models can learn about themselves through introspection, outperforming other models in self-prediction tasks, showcasing a surprising new capability and challenging prevailing assumptions abo…

item.title: MagicTailor: Component-Controllable Personalization in Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
item.description: MagicTailor empowers text-to-image models with component-level control, enabling precise customization of generated images by modifying specific visual elements.

item.title: SeerAttention: Learning Intrinsic Sparse Attention in Your LLMs
item.description: SeerAttention learns to automatically identify and leverage inherent attention sparsity in LLMs, drastically boosting inference speed and scalability while maintaining accuracy.

item.title: UCFE: A User-Centric Financial Expertise Benchmark for Large Language Models
item.description: UCFE benchmark realistically evaluates LLMs’ financial expertise via user-centric design and dynamic interactions, revealing performance gaps and highlighting the need for more robust, human-aligned m…

item.title: Web Agents with World Models: Learning and Leveraging Environment Dynamics in Web Navigation
item.description: Boosting LLM-based web agents’ performance, this study introduces World-Model-Augmented agents that simulate action outcomes for improved decision-making in complex web navigation tasks.

item.title: Context is Key(NMF): Modelling Topical Information Dynamics in Chinese Diaspora Media
item.description: KeyNMF, a novel topic modeling method, reveals how Chinese diaspora media’s information dynamics correlate with major European political events, highlighting the PRC’s potential influence.

item.title: Mini-Omni2: Towards Open-source GPT-4o with Vision, Speech and Duplex Capabilities
item.description: Mini-Omni2: An open-source, multi-modal AI model closely replicating GPT-40’s vision, speech, and text capabilities, offering valuable insights for future research.

item.title: SHAKTI: A 2.5 Billion Parameter Small Language Model Optimized for Edge AI and Low-Resource Environments
item.description: Shakti: a 2.5B parameter LLM optimized for edge AI, boasts high performance and efficiency on resource-constrained devices via novel VGQA, SwiGLU, and RoPE.

item.title: HART: Efficient Visual Generation with Hybrid Autoregressive Transformer
item.description: HART, a novel hybrid autoregressive transformer, generates high-quality 1024x1024 images efficiently, rivaling diffusion models while being significantly faster.
